name: Wingsuit Hero
description:
• To run this game, a webcam is needed.
  • As a young man borned in a small town, you've been dreaming about flying in the sky. One day you enter a world of wingsuit hero, and hero you can show your incredible talent of flying.
  • In this game players can fly through mountains, lakes, trees, cliffs, rivers, sea, islands, canyon, tunnels, clounds, conquer harsh terrain, and become more and more famous in the world.
  • Because there is an AI system embeded to control the character, players need a webcam to run this game. In this game players are a hero with wingsuit, fly freely in the sky, get realistic flying experience.
  • There are three basic levels in this game, and players can also design their own air lines to fly.
  • The wingsuit in this game is motivative, so players can fly at any direction freely.
